message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.GT. 

The paper deals with online decision problems and regret bounds, which are common topics in machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.LG, cs.AI). The specific problem addressed is the adversarial multi-armed bandit problem, which falls under the category of decision making under uncertainty and stochastic optimization (cs.DS). The paper also involves concepts of information theory and game theory, which are relevant to the sub-categories of cs.IT and cs.GT, respectively.
